description: This type represents a request for the scale NS operation.

scaleType.description: Indicates the type of scaling to be performed. Possible values: - SCALE_NS - SCALE_VNF

scaleNsData.description: The necessary information to scale the referenced NS instance. It shall be present when scaleType = SCALE_NS.

scaleVnfData.description: The necessary information to scale the referenced NS instance. It shall be present when scaleType = SCALE_VNF.

scaleTime.description: Timestamp indicating the scale time of the NS, i.e. the NS will be scaled at this timestamp. Cardinality "0" indicates the NS scaling takes place immediately".
